messages.name: Petunia
messages.message: I came to offer assistance what else?

messages.name: Henry
messages.message: The battlefield is no place for a princess!

messages.name: Petunia
messages.message: How can I ask others to fight if I am unwilling to? No I cannot ask for what I cannot give.

messages.name: Henry
messages.message: Ugh...you're going to get me killed trying to protect you and fight at the same time.

messages.name: Petunia
messages.message: I'll have your back. You could use the help.

messages.name: Henry
messages.message: Just..don't get close to anyone. Ok?

messages.name: Henry
messages.message: She's going to be the death of me...
